xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content: confluence.migrator.application=Confluence Migrator ### Wizzard steps confluence.migrator.step.prerequisites.label=Step 1 confluence.migrator.step.prerequisites.description=Prerequisites confluence.migrator.step.spaceanalysis.label=Step 2 confluence.migrator.step.spaceanalysis.description=Space analysis confluence.migrator.step.confluenceexport.label=Step 3 confluence.migrator.step.confluenceexport.description=Confluence export confluence.migrator.step.execution.label=Step 4 confluence.migrator.step.execution.description=XWiki import confluence.migrator.step.postimportfixes.label=Step 5 confluence.migrator.step.postimportfixes.description=Post import fixes confluence.migrator.step.nestedmigration.label=Step 6 confluence.migrator.step.nestedmigration.description=Nested pages ### Profile confluence.migrator.profile=Profile confluence.migrator.profile.edit=({0}edit{1}) confluence.migrator.profile.confluenceSpaceURL=Confluence Space URL confluence.migrator.profile.title=Title confluence.migrator.profile.titlehint=The title of the profile Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_username=Username Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_usernamehint=Your Atlassian user ID. On Confluence Cloud, this should be an email. On Confluence Data Center or Server, this should be an ID. Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_token=Token Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_tokenhint=On Confluence Cloud or Data Center it is an Api Token for your Atlassian Account. For Confluence Server it should be your password. Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_url=URL Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_urlhint=The URL of the Confluence instance (ex: https://my.atlassian.net). Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_customUrl=Custom URL Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_customUrlhint=Check if your URL contains a custom path or does not contain "/wiki/" in the path. Otherwise, the Migrator will try to guess the final URL including the "/wiki/" path. Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_space=Space Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_spacehint=The space that will be imported in XWiki. confluence.migrator.intro=Welcome to the Confluence Migrator. This tool will help you import the content from your Confluence instance to XWiki. For more information about this tool and pre-requisite about the Confluence Import please visit the {0}Confluence Migrator documentation{1}. If you need assistance with your migration or have any questions you can also reach out to sales@xwiki. confluence.migrator.start=Start migration confluence.migrator.resume.current=The current profile is active. Please [[resume the current migration>>Confluence.Migrator]]. confluence.migrator.resume.other=The current active profile is has not finished running. Please resume [[{0}>>{1}]] before starting the current profile. confluence.migrator.profile.description=A migration profile represents the migration of a Confluence space to XWiki. In a migration profile you will provide information about the Confluence instance and space including authentication credentials which will allow to analyze your instance. The profile will also track your progress through the import in order to be able to resume your import at any step. confluence.migrator.profile.active=The profile [[{0}>>{1}]] has been actived for the current migration with the following parameters : confluence.migrator.profile.activenext=To start the migration with the current profile, click on the **Next** button. confluence.migrator.profile.create=Click on the following link to [[create a new profile>>path:{0}]]. confluence.migrator.profile.orcreate=If the existing profiles do not match your needs, you can [[create a new profile>>path:{0}]] to start a new migration. confluence.migrator.profile.activecurrent=The current migration runs with the following parameters : confluence.migrator.profile.activemissing=There is no active migration profile. confluence.migrator.profile.list=You can start the migration from one of the existing profiles : confluence.migrator.start.migration=Start this migration confluence.migrator.reset.migration=Reset migration confluence.migrator.profile.update=Updating migration profile. confluence.migrator.profile.updatesuccess=The migration profile has been updated. confluence.migrator.profile.reset=Resetting migration profile. confluence.migrator.profile.resetsuccess=The migration has been reset successfully. confluence.migrator.profile.reports=Reports confluence.migrator.profile.checkConnection=Check connection confluence.migrator.profile.checkConnection.fail=Failed to connect to the Confluence server! Click on this message for details and contact sales@xwiki.com. confluence.migrator.profile.checkConnection.success=Test connection succeeded! ### Prerequisites confluence.migrator.prerequisites.title=Prerequisites confluence.migrator.prerequisites.description=At this step the minimal requirements for the migration are being listed. ### Space analysis confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.title=Confluence space analysis confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.description=This script has the objective of analysing a remote Confluence space and detect pages that would cause importing problems because of the page length. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.userandtokenmissing=The username and confluence token are not available. Add them using 'edit object' confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.spacemissing=The space to analyse has not been provided. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.start=Starting the analysis. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.linktoreport=Reports are saved as {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.loop=Loop {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.infourl=Getting page info from {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.pagesfound=Analyzing {0} pages. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.pagefound=The page {0} already exists in the wiki. It will be overwritten at import. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.pagearchived=Archived page {0} not found in the list of pages to be imported. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.pagenotfound=The page {0} does not exist in the wiki. It will be created at import. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.pagecheckerror=Error checking imported page {0} : {1}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.longpagename=Found long page ({0} : {1} located at {2}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.longfullhierarchy=Found long full hierarchy ({0}) : {1} located at {2}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.fullnamesize=Found full name size for page {0} : {1} with deep level {2}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.pagecheckerror=Error processing page {0} : {1}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.pages=Total number of pages : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.longpagenames=Number of long page names : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.longhierarchies=Number of long hierarchies : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.maxdeeplevel=Maximum deep level : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.save.error=Error saving status : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.data.error=Error retrieving data : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.pages=Final total number of pages : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.longpagenames=Final number of long page names : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.longhierarchies=Final number of long hierarchies : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.maxdeeplevel=Final maximum deep level : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.imported=Number of imported pages : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.missing=Number of pages that were not imported : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.remaining=Number of remaining pages : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.error=Error saving status result : {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.result.url=The report is available at {0}. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.space=Space name confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.spacehint=The name of the space to be analysed. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.hierarchy=With hierarchy analysis confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.importcheck=With page imported check (Check if the pages already exist in XWiki) confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.go=Start analysis confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.job=Status of the analysis confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.params=Parameters confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.title=Confluence space analysis report for space {0} {1} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.docsnb=Number of documents analyzed : {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.longpagenamesnb=Number of pages with long names : {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.longhierarchiesnb=Number of long hierarchies : {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.maxlevel=Deepest hierarchy level : {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.importednb=Number of pages to import : {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.skippednb=Number of pages to skip : {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.remainingnb=Number of remaining pages not found in Confluence : {0} confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.skipped=Pages to skip from importing confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.noskipped=None. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.remaining=Pages not found in Confluence confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.noremaining=None. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.saving=Saving Confluence space report confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.importedpages.start=Getting the list of imported pages confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.importedpages.end=Finished getting the list of imported pages confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.partialimport=(partial import) confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.longpagenames=Long page names found confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.nolongpagenames=None. confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.longhierarchies=Long hierarchies found confluence.migrator.spaceanalysis.report.nolonghierarchies=None. ### Confluence export confluence.migration.export.title=Confluence space export confluence.migration.export.description=At this step, a full export of the space must be ran from your Confluence instance.\nGo to {0}Export space{1} and follow the next steps:\n* Select **Full export** \n* Choose **Export**\n\nThe XML resulted from the export will be used in the following step where the migration will start. ## Import (Filter) confluence.migrator.input=Input confluence.migrator.output=Output confluence.migrator.input.source=Source confluence.migrator.input.source.description=The source to load the Confluence pages from. confluence.migrator.input.source.supportedformats=Supported formats are file:<path on server> (e.g. file:/home/myuser/myfile.zip) and url:<url> (e.g. http://myserver/some/file/to/myfile.zip). confluence.migrator.advanced=Advanced setup confluence.migrator.import=Import confluence.migrator.upload=Upload confluence.migrator.upload.label=File confluence.migrator.upload.hint=Upload the Confluence .ZIP archive. Please make sure the size does not exceed 1GB. ## Post import fixes confluence.migrator.parents.space=Space confluence.migrator.parents.space.hint=The name of the space to check for invalid parents. confluence.migrator.parents.pagesnb=Number of pages to check confluence.migrator.parents.pagesnb.hint=The number of pages in the above space to check for invalid parents. confluence.migrator.parents.checkgo=Check parents confluence.migrator.parents.fixgo=Fix invalid parents confluence.migrator.parents.fix=Fix invalid parents confluence.migrator.postImportFixes.checkParents=Verify pages without parents confluence.migrator.postImportFixes.checkInvalidParents=Verify invalid parents (containing dot in the name) confluence.migrator.postImportFixes.detectLongPages=Detect too long page names confluence.migrator.postImportFixes.longNamesHandling=Fix documents with too long page names
